name: com.bugsnag.unitynotifier
displayName: UPM release of the Bugsnag Unity Notifier
description: The Bugsnag Unity Library gives you instant notification of exceptions thrown from your Unity games on iOS and Android devices, as well as standalone Mac, WebGL and Windows deployments. Exceptions in your Unity code (JS, C# and Boo) as well as native crashes (Objective C, Java) are automatically detected and sent to Bugsnag.
